```{r setup, echo=FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```



```{r}
pols_month_df = 
  read_csv("data/pols-month.csv") |> 
  separate(mon,
    into = c("year", "month","day"), sep = "-") |> 
  mutate(
    month = case_match(
      month,
      "01" ~ "january",
      "02" ~ "february",
      "03" ~ "march",
      "04" ~ "april",
      "05" ~ "may",
      "06" ~ "june",
      "07" ~ "july",
      "08" ~ "august",
      "09" ~ "september",
      "10" ~ "october",
      "11" ~ "november",
      "12" ~ "december")
  )
  
```
